about.title: Ensure every detail of your fairytale wedding is perfect.
about.body1: Elite Wedding Planner specializes in designing, planning, and delivering full-service weddings. We are the trusted choice for busy couples who want a professional team to manage the entire processâ€”from venue consultation and vendor selection to detailed coordination on the wedding day.
about.body2: With a commitment to respecting our clientsâ€™ vision, optimizing budgets, and delivering high-quality services, Elite partners with you to create a flawless, meaningful wedding that reflects your unique personal style.

team.title: Meet the Ellie Team
team.subtitle: A Leading Wedding Planning Company
team.body:
We provide premium wedding planning services.
Ellie specializes in creating beautiful, memorable weddings that reflect your unique style and personality. Let us turn your wedding dream into reality.

testimonials.title: Love Stories
testimonials.subtitle: Hear from couples who trusted us on their special day

items.name: Sarah & James
items.text: "Working with Elite Wedding Planner was the best decision we made. They transformed our vision into reality and handled every detail flawlessly. Our wedding was absolutely perfect!"

items.name: Roise & Ravi
items.text: "Thank you so much to the team for supporting us so enthusiastically throughout the planning process and execution. We were truly lucky to have found you. package1.title: Full Wedding Package
package1.desc: Perfect for couples who want full support from A to Z.

before.title: Before the Wedding
items: Consultation and detailed planning of decoration style and program within budget.
Venue scouting with the couple.
Creating a detailed event script and timeline.
Coordinating delivery schedules with all vendors.
Designing and printing invitations and necessary decorative details.

during.title: On the Wedding Day
items: Working directly with restaurants and hotels.
Welcoming and guiding guests according to family requests.
Supervising sound, lighting, and program timeline.
Coordinating MCs, bands, makeup artists, decorators, etc.
Working with photo and video teams and managing logistics.
Handling any unexpected issues flexibly and professionally.

after.title: After the Wedding
items: Working with photo and video teams on final edits.
Supporting the resolution of any post-event issues (if any).
Final acceptance and payment settlement with vendors.

package2.title: Wedding Day Coordination Package
package2.desc: Ideal for couples who have already planned most details themselves.

scope.title: Scope of Work
items: Receiving and reviewing the coupleâ€™s full wedding plan.
Creating a detailed timeline for the wedding day.
Coordinating all vendors (decor, sound, lighting, photo, video, etc.).
Guiding bridesmaids, groomsmen, and both families.
Controlling the event flow and handling unexpected issues.
Focused mainly on the final 1â€“2 months before the wedding.

for.title: For Couples Who
items: Have already chosen a venue, booked services, and designed the program.
Want to fully enjoy their wedding day without worrying about timing.
Have support from family/friends but still want professional assurance.
